item.title: Paid Internships Through Nats-Portal
item.description: Get yourself the skills the Industry Needs from Apprentice Training. First of all, what is NATS? NATS stands for National Apprenticeship Training Scheme. It is implemented by the MHRD. The government of India has mandated all the industries both private and public should engage some fresh graduates from colleges as Apprentices and train them. This is a boon for many as freshers from colleges donâ€™t usually have the know-hows and the skills required for working in the field right after college.
